ftbquests.chapter.thermal_expansion.ques: This is just a dull hull[--这只是个无聊的外壳--]
The next step up of our Pity Machine Frames are these Machine Frames.[--我们低级机器框架的下一步骤是这些。--]
They need some Steel Components and some Compressed Iron and open up various Pneumaticcraft and Thermal Machines[--它们需要一些钢和压缩铁来制作,各种气动工艺和热力的机器都需要以这个为起点--]
(Almost) all &eThermal Expansion&r machines are crafted using &bMachine Frames&r.[--(几乎)所有&e热力膨胀&r的机器都是用&b机器框架&r制作的.--]
Microwave[--微波炉--]
Fossil Fuels are so 2018.[--化石燃料都是2018年才会用的东西。--]
The &bRedstone Furnace&r allows you to use FE to smelt items instead.[--&b红石熔炉&r允许你使用FE来烧炼物品.--]
Crushinator[--粉碎机--]
The &bPulverizer&r &6crushes items&r.[--&b磨粉机&r用来&6粉碎物品&r.--]
Macrowave[--微波炉--]
The &bInduction Furnace&r is used to &6combine materials into alloys&r.[--&感应炉&r用于&6将材料制成合金&r.--]
Random Thermal Alloy[--随机热力合金--]
SAWMILL! SAWMILL![--锯木厂！锯木厂！--]
The &bSawmill&r allows you to &6get more Planks from Logs&r![--&b锯木机&r允许你&6从原木中获取更多的木板&r!--]
Also gives Sawdust![--还给锯末呢!--]
Air Conditionern't[--制热空调--]
The &bMagma Crucible&r will be able to &6melt items into fluids&r.[--&b熔岩炉&r可以&6将物品熔炼成流体&r.--]
Air Conditioner[--空调--]
The &bBlast Chiller&r &6freezes fluids into blocks&r.[--&b急速冷冻机&r&6将流体凝固成方块&r.--]
Hydroponic[--水培--]
Using a &bPhythogenic Insulator&r will &6grow crops and plants in its inventory&r.[--可以在&b有机灌注器&r中&6种植作物和植物&r.--]
There are various optional fertilizers you can give it to make it work faster.[--你可以给它各种可选肥料来让它工作得快点.--]
Upgrade your Machines![--升级你的机器!--]
&bIntegral Components&r are crucial to making your Machines more effective.[--&b整合组件&r对于提高机器的效率至关重要.--]
They scale your &6Thermal Expansion&r Machines by the number shown in the Tooltip.[--它们按工具提示中显示的数字加速热力机器.--]
&bReinforced Integral Components&r will make your machines even faster.[--&b强化整合组件&r可以让你的机器更快.--]
These will Speed up machines threefold.[--它们会三倍加速机器。--]
With some Enderium and Lumium you can make some &bResonant Integral Components&r.[--你可以用一些末影锭和流明锭制作一些&b谐振整合组件&r.--]
These are the last upgrade and will make your Machine scale up to 4x its speed.[--这是最后一个升级,你的机器将达到4x速度.--]
Make a Machine Augment[--制作机器增强--]
Thermal machines can have various &bAugments&r installed onto them, changing their function in some way.[--热力机器可以安装各种&b增强&r,改变它们的某种功能.--]
Some simply make it work faster or more efficiently, while others add new functions entirely.[--有的只是让它工作得更快或更高效,有的则完全增加了新的功能。--]
Machine Augments[--机器增强--]
